author: rhuijben
msg: Refactor a function that is filled with error handling into two functions
where the inner function can now use the common SVN_ERR() handling.
This patch shouldn't change any behavior, but hopefully will make it
possible to change things in separate small steps.
(bump_moved_away): ... this function, which now calls bump_moved_layer.
